abstract: The name of the file containing the sound to play when an alert is displayed.
overview:
## Discussion

For this property, specify the filename (including extension) of a sound resource in the app’s main bundle or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILocalNotificationDefaultSoundName] to request the default system sound. When the system displays an alert for a local notification or badges an app icon, it plays this sound. The default value is `nil` (no sound). Sounds that last longer than 30 seconds are not supported. If you specify a file with a sound that plays over 30 seconds, the default sound is played instead.

For information on valid sound resources, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/RemoteNotificationsPG/Chapters/IPhoneOSClientImp.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008194-CH103] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/RemoteNotificationsPG/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008194].

# soundName

**Instance Property**

The name of the file containing the sound to play when an alert is displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var soundName: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For this property, specify the filename (including extension) of a sound resource in the app’s main bundle or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILocalNotificationDefaultSoundName] to request the default system sound. When the system displays an alert for a local notification or badges an app icon, it plays this sound. The default value is `nil` (no sound). Sounds that last longer than 30 seconds are not supported. If you specify a file with a sound that plays over 30 seconds, the default sound is played instead.

For information on valid sound resources, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/RemoteNotificationsPG/Chapters/IPhoneOSClientImp.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008194-CH103] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/NetworkingInternet/Conceptual/RemoteNotificationsPG/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008194].

## Configuring other parts of the notification

- **applicationIconBadgeNumber**: The number to display as the app’s icon badge.
- **userInfo**: A dictionary for passing custom information to the notified app.
